title: Hypnotic Watch Face
summary: Hypnotic is an animated and customisable watch face for your wear device.
description: Hypnotic allows you to customise your watch in your own unique way through thousands of possible combinations. Customisable options include:- Hypnotic spiral styles- Spiral colour- Spiral line width- Background colour- Hour hand colour- Minute hand colour- Second hand colour- Tick indicator styles- Minute tick colour- Minute quarter tick colour- Animation, which can be enabled or disabled- Rotation speed- Frames per second
descriptionHTML:
Hypnotic allows you to customise your watch in your own unique way through thousands of possible combinations.

Customisable options include:

- Hypnotic spiral styles
- Spiral colour
- Spiral line width
- Background colour
- Hour hand colour
- Minute hand colour
- Second hand colour
- Tick indicator styles
- Minute tick colour
- Minute quarter tick colour
- Animation, which can be enabled or disabled
- Rotation speed
- Frames per second
comments: Nice watch face, works nice and smooth...

Doesn't update time in dim mode It could have been great, but that the time remains still while in dim mode and only gets updated if you touch the screen or push the button on the Huawei Watch, makes it useless as a watch.
Great watch face Definitely a change from the normal faces...great quality.   Would like to have an option to not have ticks.
Great App Its a great App Highly Recommended
Awesome! This app is really good and easy to use!
recentChanges: - Customise Hypnotic Watch Face from your wrist!
